books.author: by Michael Wolff
books.description: A journalist offers an inside account of the first year of the Trump White House.
books.name: FIRE AND FURY

books.author: by Steven Pinker
books.description: A case for using reason, science and humanism to counter pessimistic views of Western civilization.
books.name: ENLIGHTENMENT NOW

books.author: by Neil deGrasse Tyson
books.description: A straightforward, easy-to-understand introduction to the laws that govern the universe.
books.name: ASTROPHYSICS FOR PEOPLE IN A HURRY

books.author: by James Patterson and Alex Abramovich with Mike Harvkey
books.description: The story of Aaron Hernandez, the New England Patriots tight end convicted of first-degree murder.
books.name: ALL-AMERICAN MURDER

books.author: by Kate Bowler
books.description: A divinity school professor examines her tacit beliefs when she learns she has late-stage colon cancer.
books.name: EVERYTHING HAPPENS FOR A REASON

books.author: by Jonathan Abrams
books.description: An oral history of the creation and development of the series "The Wire."
books.name: ALL THE PIECES MATTER

books.author: by David Grann
books.description: The story of a murder spree in 1920s Oklahoma that targeted Osage Indians, whose lands contained oil.
books.name: KILLERS OF THE FLOWER MOON

books.author: by Doug Stanton
books.description: Special Forces operatives fought the Taliban on horseback shortly after Sept. 11. The basis of the movie "12 Strong."
books.name: HORSE SOLDIERS

books.author: by Walter Isaacson
books.description: A biography of the Italian Renaissance polymath which connects his work in various disciplines.
books.name: LEONARDO DA VINCI

books.author: by Johann Hari
books.description: The journalist describes nine causes of depression and anxiety, and offers potential solutions.
books.name: LOST CONNECTIONS

books.author: by Joe Biden
books.description: The former vice president recalls his toughest year in office, as his son battled brain cancer.
books.name: PROMISE ME, DAD

books.author: by Andrew Morton
books.description: The story of the American socialite whose relationship with King Edward VIII forced him to abdicate his throne.
books.name: WALLIS IN LOVE

books.author: by Pete Souza
books.description: More than 300 pictures of the former president by his White House photographer, with behind-the-scenes stories.
books.name: OBAMA

books.author: by Daniel H. Pink
books.description: Research from several fields reveals the ideal time to make small decisions and big life changes.
books.name: WHEN

books.author: by Tiffany Haddish
books.description: The comedian recounts growing up in South Central Los Angeles and finding success after a period of homelessness.
books.name: THE LAST BLACK UNICORN
